programme.title: Somebody Knows Something

programme.title: Dead Stop

programme.title: Marauders

programme.title: The Seventh
programme.desc: Star Trek: Enterprise, S02E07, Assigned to track down a Vulcan fugitive she lost 17 years ago, T'Pol enlists Archer and Mayweather's help in retrieving him, but finding the criminal triggers mysterious, deadly memories she has trouble resolving.

programme.title: The Communicator
programme.desc: Star Trek: Enterprise, S02E08, When Reed accidentally loses his communicator during a visit to a pre-Warp culture, he and Archer must retrieve it, but when they do, they are mistaken for spies and are faced with the threat of execution.

programme.title: The Catwalk

programme.title: Dawn
programme.desc: Star Trek: Enterprise, S02E13, Trip is fired upon by a territorial alien and forced to land on the night side of a moon.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E01, In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Murder In the Midwest
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E03, The body of Lori Nesson is found in a ditch in 1974, yet her death is not ruled a homicide. After four decades, the cause of death is changed to homicide, and the search begins for a killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5015, Our cameras follow Detective Manny Reyes as he investigates the 1990 murder of a Fort Worth, Texas woman. Reyes talks to the woman's two sons, who believe that her husband, Bobby, was the murderer.

programme.title: Friday Night Ghosts
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E15, In late 1983, the bodies of five people abducted from a local fast food restaurant are found brutally murdered. The main suspect is long believed to be a well-connected local man, until new evidence reveals the true killers.

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Circle of Friends
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E07, When 18-year-old Shannon Siders' body is found in the woods, everyone in the small town of Newaygo, Michigan, becomes a suspect--but no one is convicted of the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S09E02, The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: She Never Came Home
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E03, The case of a gruesome stabbing death of a bullied teenager remains unsolved for 27 years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E19, After U.S. Navy sailor disappears in 68, the Navy claims he went AWOL. But his sister works for over 30 years to prove that he was really killed. And DNA from a cigarette butt helps detectives to unravel a 20-year-old case of rape and murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E09, On a summer night in 1987, a 17-year-old girl to come home is found raped and strangled near the Hudson River. And In 1983, a young mother is raped and murdered at work. The crime remains unsolved for two decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E06, A videotape made at an ATM machine helps police in Louisville, KY, to nab a man suspected of raping 13 women. And a DA investigator in Georgia helps crack a murder case that his father, a police chief, first worked on 30 years before.

programme.title: The Lost Patient
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E25, In 1979 Janie Landers disappears from a home for the impaired--the latest consequence of the facility's history of neglect. When Janie's body is found, there are many suspects but it is years before the killer is found.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E15, Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Space
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E11, An alien vessel appears in Destinyâ€™s path and launches an attack, capturing Chloe. Col. Young must use the stones again to get aboard the ship and try to rescue Chloe. He quickly realizes, however, that Chloe isnâ€™t the only prisoner aboard.

programme.title: Divided
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E12, Suspecting an alien tracking device may be hidden somewhere aboard the Destiny, Col. Young and Lt. Scott search the shipâ€™s hull. While distracted by the search, a group aboard the Destiny puts in action a coup that has life-threatening consequences.

programme.title: Faith
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E13, Dwindling supplies, tedious routines, and low morale continue to plague the crew of the Destiny when the ship suddenly drops out of FTL and enters the orbit of an uncharted star. But, for the first time, the countdown clock doesnâ€™t activate!

programme.title: Divide And Conquer
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E05, When an SGC soldier under the influence of a Goa'uld mind-control device attempts to assassinate a High Council member, SG-1 must uncover other potential assassins, even amongst themselves, before the president arrives for a crucial Summit meeting!

programme.title: Window Of Opportunity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E06, After a visit to a strange planet in the middle of a geomagnetic storm they find themselves repeating the same day over and over again. The team must utilize their accumulated knowledge to stop the time loop before there are disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Watergate
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E07, SG-1 joins forces with a Russian scientist to investigate a rogue Stargate in Siberia, linked to a mysterious water planet. The team must venture via submarine to the water planet, where they encounter an unexpectedly terrifying alien presence.

programme.title: The First Ones
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E08, During an archaeological survey of fossils on a Goa'uld planet, Daniel is abducted by a fearsome creature, prompting SG-1 to embark on a mission to free him. But Daniel soon learns that the creature's intentions are not what he thought!

programme.title: Scorched Earth
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E09, After relocating an endangered civilization to a safe new planet, the team realizes that another race of aliens is planning to incinerate the planet's surface to make it inhabitable. Will SG-1 be able to reason with the marauding aliens?

programme.title: Beneath The Surface
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E10, With memories erased and identities changed, SG-1 find themselves trapped below a domed city on a planet of ice, toiling as slave laborers. Can they come to their senses and make a break for the surface, or will they remain enslaved underground?

programme.title: Point Of No Return
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E11, When a quirky conspiracy theorist contacts SG-1 claiming to know classified information about the Stargate, at first they think he's bluffing. But when they investigate his wild claims, they realize he's a lot closer to the truth than they thought.

programme.title: Tangent
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E12, When O'Neill and Teal'c take an SGC-modified Goa'uld glider out for a test flight, they lose control and are sucked into outer space by a Goa'uld tracking device. It's up to the team to rescue them, before they run out oxygen and life support.

programme.title: The Curse
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E13, When Daniel Jackson returns to Chicago to attend the funeral of his mentor, a celebrated archaeologist, he soon realizes that the death is mysteriously connected to the recent discovery of a 10,000-year-old Egyptian artifact that might be cursed.

programme.title: The Serpent's Venom
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E14, SG-1 travels to a remote interplanetary minefield to sabotage a hazardous alliance between two powerful Goa'uld System Lords. But their mission becomes far more dangerous when they realize Teal'c has been captured by one of the Lords.

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E15, When SGC commander Gen. Hammond steps down saying he's too old for the job, SG-1 suspects foul play. When a hard-nosed new general steps in to replace him and splits up SG-1, they vow to solve the mystery and get their beloved General back.

Stargate SG-1, S04E16, A decade in the future, Earth's alliance with a highly intelligent race of aliens has rendered SGC obsolete. But when Carter, now married to an ambassador, uncovers a terrifying secret, she must reassemble SG-1 to send an urgent message to the past.

programme.title: Doppelganger
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E04, During an exploratory walk on a jungle planet, Sheppard touches a glowing crystalline growth and becomes host to an infectious energy form. Once on Atlantis, the entity begins to move from person to person, putting the entire crew at risk.

programme.title: Travelers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E05, On his way back to Atlantis, Lt. Col. Sheppard is taken prisoner by a rogue ship helmed by a ruthless human commander with a secret agenda. As the team searches for him, Sheppard's resourcefulness is put to the test as he tries to stay alive.
